questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
This arc takes the Straw Hat Pirates to a sky island where they face off against a self-proclaimed God with lightning powers. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
This former captain of the Sun Pirates and fish-man is known for his tragic past and his nickname 'Jinbe the Knight of the Sea'. Who is...?
